This is not a bug in the checkpointing nor in RNNParamsSaveable.

This is a bug in the CudnnRNNParamsToCanonical op or in CudnnSupport::createRnnDescriptor or even in cuDNN itself.

Note that the test also seems to be not correct. @alquraishi, you are only summing shape[0]. But you should sum prod(shape). I wonder why that worked for you in the unidirectional case. It does not for me.

body:
This is not a bug in the checkpointing nor in `RNNParamsSaveable`.

This is a bug in the `CudnnRNNParamsToCanonical` op or in `CudnnSupport::createRnnDescriptor` or even in cuDNN itself.

Note that the test also seems to be not correct. @alquraishi, you are only summing `shape[0]`. But you should sum `prod(shape)`. I wonder why that worked for you in the unidirectional case. It does not for me.
